name: PATIENT_PREF_LOC
description: The PATIENT_PREF_LOC table contains information of the patient's preferred locations.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient with the preferred location.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the preferred locations of the patient.

columns.name: LOC_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.
